titles.title: A bill to extend the provisions of the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations.

calendar.text: Committee on Agriculture. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 2560 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Introduced. Amends the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983, as amended by the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act, to extend the temporary emergency food assistance program (TEFAP), including storage and distribution authorizations, through FY 1990. Increases the amount of TEFAP funds for emergency feeding organizations.
